title: Who is considered to be an orphan? |Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: an orphan is a person whose father dies before him reaching the age of puberty so if a child a boy or a girl the father dies when the boy or the girl are 8 or 9 years of age he's an orphan once the boy or the girl hits puberty they are not called orphan anymore the death of the mother does not make them orphans only the death of the father
